A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a huge Star Wars fan for my whole life I'm praying that Rian Johnson won't get to do the next trilogy. During the Canto Bight scene I had to leave the theatre. I simply couldn't bear the Harry Potter style. This movie deserves a negative rating. The fanbase would be better off if Rian Johnson never shot this movie.\nI btw. enjoyed 'The Force Awakens' and 'Rogue One' very much and am still looking forward to 'Solo'.
